summary: Clone the referenced online store, add Stripe-based checkout for purchasing store items, and provide an admin role for managing the store.

existing_features.title: Recreate the storefront UI and product catalog to match the store at https://ocarinalearning-sw1.caffeine.xyz/store, including core pages and interactions needed to browse items and start a purchase.
Implement a Motoko-backed product catalog API to serve storefront data (items, prices, images/metadata) and support reading the catalog from the frontend.

Add Stripe payment setup so authenticated users can purchase store items via Stripe Checkout (or equivalent Stripe-hosted flow), including success/cancel handling and an order record stored in the backend.

Add an admin role and admin-only UI for managing the store (at minimum: create/edit/delete products and update prices). Make the requester an admin by allowing configuration of an initial admin Principal and enforcing admin-only access in the backend and frontend.
Apply a coherent visual theme across the app (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) appropriate for an online store; avoid a blue/purple primary palette unless explicitly requested.

new_feature_requests.summary: Replicate the existing store from the provided URL (storefront UI and item catalog)
Integrate Stripe payments to allow users to purchase store items
Create an admin role/account for the user with permissions to manage the store
